showScoreExcerpt:
"The relationship between these two people is painted with such intimacy we feel like we are eavesdropping. Each pushes the story forward, one step at a time. Recklessness cannot be measured in centimeters. What we bear witness to is our own strange paths. This play is a mirror. We are all survivors of our own making: broken and brave; remorseful and strong; battered and brilliant. All driving with our pedals to the metal."
